text: Three cuts for my son's cat deck
Probably Spidersilk Armor for one
you’re missing some of my favorite cats for that deck dana
any cat with a natural double strike is devistating
and yeah, spider silk should go
speaking from experience with teaching kids about that age to play, they do not like sacrificing creatures to draw cards
even though it is correct in the deck to run them
What cat Patrick?
so maybe a [[soul’s majesty]] or [[rishkar’s expertise]] might be better in there

text: there’s two
I think I have Majesty and Expertise
adorned pouncer and skyhunter skirmisher
skyhunter is a straight winning card on turn three
you just 8 people
oh you’re right
I also gurentee that he will hate greater good in that deck at first
I think it’d be worth having a copy around for when he gets a little more experienced in it
Added both, pulled Rakasha
Just too much to play and equip even if the effect is good
and when he starts talking to you about making the deck better
that was my experience with the deck too
Makes sense
It's a disgusting card in the deck, but yeah, new players hate saccing their own stuff even if it is game changing resource advantage
they hate saccing and discarding
does he know the basics of playing yet?

Yea, he just has struggled in the past with staying focused, but we've been playing more complex board games lately and he's been doing better with it playing Catan and things like Smash Up so we're gonna try again. Plus he's super into this series of books called the Warriors about cats and is hype about a cat deck.

alright, I was thinking of suggesting to cut some of the more complex cards but if he knows the basics they should be ok, I would just reconsider the sacrifice cards until he knows the value of those things a little more
I think I might try Sultai Sidisi zombies. I like that it encourages weird draw spells etc that are worded as to be mill.
sultai is such a value dump of a color combo
Sidisi encourges you to not do that
A little anyway
nah, she still does
just in a different way
I mean, yeah Rhystic Study is still great, but it's easier not not run it when stuff like [[Strategic Planning]] does value-added work

text: I do think that bird that counters an activated ability would be good too
cause you cycle, counter and get a zombie, or you get a flash flyer
How would you get a zombie from that?
with sidisi out, you have a creature go to the yard
so zombo’d
From the library. That’s from your hand.
ah shoot
Don't let them tell you how to live your life Patrick
I live my life by casting spells and seeing what happens
very little planning involved
I don’t make the rules...I just tell you when you break ‘em.
Sidisi reanimation is a very powerful and potentially fast.
Traumatize into Rise of the Dark Realms seems p good
Traumatize is too slow in reanimation decks in my experience
Well. I was thinking more entomb into reanimate
Think I'm gonna go more tokens

Reanimate is tricky to modulate. Why entomb a non-degenerate creature when you can get turn 2 Jin-Gitaxis or something? And if  you're not getting Jin or something equally degenerate then it feels wierd to be just grabbing a random dude

I'm wondering if I might pick the brain of the EDH hivemind concerning a Magic project of mine. 

I'm designing a Theros-themed "campaign" of sorts using Horde decks (it's co-op versus AI Magic, the decks are made mostly of tokens and have simple rules to pilot themselves. For more info, here's one take on the full ruleset: <https://mtg.gamepedia.com/Horde_Magic)>

This campaign is going to be balanced for 3 players. At one point, I plan for an encounter that will pit the players against multiple Horde decks at once, and to ensure that they don't get completely wrecked, they'll have help from Kruphix. To this end, I've created 20 Archenemy-style cards with some palette-swapping ("Scheme" to "Blessing", "Set this scheme in motion" to "Invoke this blessing", etc.) They use the term "teammates" to indicate, "each human player fighting the Horde decks".

I'm looking for feedback on the Blessings themselves, in both layout design and card design. If you have any comments, I'd love to hear them! Feel free to ask for more context, I probably forgot some of it

Blessings album: <https://imgur.com/gallery/OVwqr>

attachments.title: The Blessings of Kruphix
attachments.text: Imgur: The magic of the Internet
